subtitle: A tasty and colourful combination of red cabbage, beetroot and fiery horseradish.

method.text: Place 45 ml oil in a large mixing bowl or casserole dish. Cover with a lid or cling film and heat in the microwave on 100% FULL power for 3 min.
Add the cabbage and onion. Toss well in the oil. Cover and cook for 5-6 min on 100% FULL power, stirring every min and adding more oil if required. The cabbage should soften but retain its crispness.
Stir in the beetroot, horseradish and seasoning. Cover and cook for 2-3 min on 100% FULL power to heat through.

title: Red cabbage with beetroot
